---
title: "Study protocol"
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Convert a docx file to quarto markdown and render on this page
pacman::p_load(here, rmarkdown)
pandoc_convert(input = list.files("protocol", 
                                  pattern = ".docx", 
                                  full.names = TRUE)[1],
               wd = here::here(),
               to = "markdown", 
               output = "protocol/protocol.qmd")

res <- knitr::knit_child("protocol/protocol.qmd", quiet = TRUE)
cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
